nodes.documentation:
A crowdsale that retains the previous token, but changes some parameters.
 * Investor data can be manually fed in.
 * Mostly useful as a hot fix.
nodes.name: RelaunchedCrowdsale

nodes.documentation: Check if a particular transaction has already been written.
nodes.name: getRestoredTransactionStatus

nodes.documentation: Rebuild the previous invest data back to the crowdsale.
nodes.name: setInvestorData

nodes.documentation: Rebuild the previous invest data and do a token reissuance.
nodes.name: setInvestorDataAndIssueNewToken
